perturbation.original_text: 9.3 To remunerate HGF on the basis of thirty percent (30%) of net Company income basis on an annual basis commencing 12 months after the first full 12-month revenue period.
perturbation.changed_text: 9.3 To remunerate HGF based on a percentage of Company income as determined by NVOS, commencing at a time decided by NVOS.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly states HGF will be remunerated thirty percent of net company income. The changed text is ambiguous to the percentage that HGF will receive, and also the time when the remuneration begins. This is now at the discretion of NVOS.

perturbation.original_text: 10.6 To provide a minimum of seven thousand (7000) acres for the Primary Project to be identified by each individual lot, including size, and its placement in the annual rotation as per SCHEDULE A.
perturbation.changed_text: 10.6 To provide land for the Primary Project.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly states HGF will provide a minimum of seven thousand acres for the Primary Project, along with SCHEDULE A and lot breakdowns. The changed text now does not specify the amount of acres, and removes any mention of SCHEDULE A.

perturbation.original_text: 12.1 The distribution will be based on NVOS audited review and will be made within three months of annual considerations on the basis of a seventy percent (70%) of net profit to NVOS and thirty percent (30%) of net profit to HGF.
perturbation.changed_text: 12.1 Distribution amounts will be decided at the sole discretion of NVOS.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states clearly the distribution percentages for both NVOS and HGF (70/30). The changed text removes the clause of a distribution agreement altogether, and states it is all at the discretion of NVOS.
